member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box displays a warning if the user specifies a file name that does not exist.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.CheckPathExists
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box displays a warning if the user specifies a path that does not exist.

member.summary: Gets the custom places collection for this FileDialog instance.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.DefaultExt
member.summary: Gets or sets the default file name extension.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.DereferenceLinks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box returns the location of the file referenced by the shortcut or whether it returns the location of the shortcut (.lnk).

member.summary: Defines which dialog to be shown to the user.

member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the file name selected in the file dialog box.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.FileNames
member.summary: Gets the file names of all selected files in the dialog box.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.Filter
member.summary: Gets or sets the current file name filter string, which determines the choices that appear in the "Save as file type" or "Files of type" box in the dialog box.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.FilterIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the filter currently selected in the file dialog box.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.InitialDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial directory displayed by the file dialog box.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.Multiselect
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box allows multiple files to be selected.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.ReadOnlyChecked
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the read-only check box is selected.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.RestoreDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box restores the directory to the previously selected directory before closing.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.RootFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the root folder where the browsing starts from.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.SafeFileName
member.summary: Gets the file name and extension for the file selected in the dialog box. The file name does not include the path.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.SafeFileNames
member.summary: Gets an array of file names and extensions for all the selected files in the dialog box. The file names do not include the path.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.SelectedPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path selected by the user.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.ShowHelp
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Help button is displayed in the file dialog box.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.ShowNewFolderButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the New Folder button appears in the folder browser dialog box.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.ShowReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box contains a read-only check box.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.SupportMultiDottedExtensions
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the dialog box supports displaying and saving files that have multiple file name extensions.

member.summary: Getting this property returns a string copy of the contents of the text box. Setting this property replaces the contents of the text box with the specified string.

member.summary: Gets or sets the dialog box title.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.FileDirSelector.ShortenPath(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shortens a file path to a specified given length.
member.param: The file path to shorten
The max length of the output path.
member.returns: The path with some of the middle directory paths replaced with an ellipsis when the given path is over the given length otherwise returns the given path.
member.remarks: Shortens the path by removing some of the "middle directories" in the path and inserting an ellipsis. If the filename and root path (drive letter or UNC server name) in itself exceeds the maxLength, the filename will be cut to fit. UNC-paths and relative paths are also supported. The inserted ellipsis is not a true ellipsis char, but a string of three dots.
member.example:
ShortenPath(@"c:\websites\myproject\www_myproj\App_Data\themegafile.txt", 50)
Result: "c:\websites\myproject\...\App_Data\themegafile.txt"
ShortenPath(@"c:\websites\myproject\www_myproj\App_Data\theextremelylongfilename_morelength.txt", 30)
Result: "c:\...gfilename_morelength.txt"
ShortenPath(@"\\myserver\theshare\myproject\www_myproj\App_Data\theextremelylongfilename_morelength.txt", 30)
Result: "\\myserver\...e_morelength.txt"
ShortenPath(@"\\myserver\theshare\myproject\www_myproj\App_Data\themegafile.txt", 50)
Result: "\\myserver\theshare\...\App_Data\themegafile.txt"
ShortenPath(@"\\192.168.1.178\theshare\myproject\www_myproj\App_Data\themegafile.txt", 50)
Result: "\\192.168.1.178\theshare\...\themegafile.txt"
ShortenPath(@"\theshare\myproject\www_myproj\App_Data\", 30)
Result: "\theshare\...\App_Data\"
ShortenPath(@"\theshare\myproject\www_myproj\App_Data\themegafile.txt", 35)
Result: "\theshare\...\themegafile.txt"
